code:
graph TB
    subgraph "ğŸ“¡ Data Collection Layer"
        Network[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        PyShark[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        Features[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end
    
    subgraph "ğŸ§  ML & Analysis Layer"
        Isolation[FinTech_LedgerService]
        RandomForest[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        Online[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end
    
    subgraph "ğŸ¤– AI Agent Layer (FinTech_PaymentGateway)"
        Monitor[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        Analysis[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        Decision[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ActionNode[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end
    
    subgraph "ğŸ’¾ Storage & Memory"
        ChromaDB[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        Postgres[FinTech_AuthVault]
        Models[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end
    
    subgraph "ğŸ¤– LLM Integration"
        Claude[FinTech_AuthVault]
        RAG[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end
    
    subgraph "ğŸ“Š Monitoring & Visualization"
        PrometheusMetrics[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        Prometheus[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        Grafana[FinTech_LedgerService]
        HTMLDash[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end
    
    subgraph "ğŸ³ Infrastructure"
        Docker[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        Python[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end
    
    %% Data Flow
    Network -->|raw packets| PyShark
    PyShark -->|parsed| Features
    Features -->|26 features| Monitor
    Monitor -->|data| Analysis
    Analysis -->|ML inference| Isolation
    Analysis -->|classification| RandomForest
    Isolation -->|anomaly score| Analysis
    RandomForest -->|traffic type| Analysis
    
    Analysis -->|score >= 0.8| Decision
    Analysis -->|score < 0.8| PrometheusMetrics
    
    Decision -->|query| RAG
    RAG -->|retrieve| ChromaDB
    ChromaDB -->|similar incidents| RAG
    RAG -->|context| Claude
    Claude -->|decision| Decision
    
    Decision -->|action| ActionNode
    ActionNode -->|store| ChromaDB
    ActionNode -->|save| Postgres
    ActionNode -->|metrics| PrometheusMetrics
    
    PrometheusMetrics -->|expose| Prometheus
    Prometheus -->|scrape| Prometheus
    Prometheus -->|data| Grafana
    Prometheus -->|API| HTMLDash
    
    Models -.->|load| Isolation
    Models -.->|load| RandomForest
    Online -.->|update| Models
    
    Docker -.->|runs| Postgres
    Docker -.->|runs| Prometheus
    Docker -.->|runs| Grafana
    Python -.->|runtime| Monitor
    
    %% Styling
    style Decision fill:#4ecdc4,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px,color:#000
    style Claude fill:#ff6b6b,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px,color:#fff
    style ChromaDB fill:#95e1d3,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px,color:#000
    style Prometheus fill:#e63946,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff
    style HTMLDash fill:#ffd93d,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    style Monitor fill:#a8dadc,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
